sentences: Min채 arvaan, ett채 h채n tulee huomenna.
H채n ei osaa arvata oikeaa vastausta.
context: The Finnish verb 'arvata' means 'to guess'. It is a regular verb that conjugates according to the Kotus type 73 pattern. The word can also mean 'to predict' or 'to speculate', and it has various forms depending on the tense, mood, and person. For example, 'arvaan' means 'I guess', while 'arvasin' means 'I guessed'. It is important to note that in some dialects of Western Finnish, 'arvata' can also mean 'to dare'.
